name: insomnia-plugin-date-time-add
description: Allows you to use a date /time as a template tag and allows basic addition. forked from https://github.com/SebBrookfield/DateAdd that works only with day/month/year

insomnia.name: Date/Time Add
insomnia.description: Allows you to use a date as a template tag and allows basic date & time addition.
